metadata.title: CVE-2021-37231 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A stack-buffer-overflow occurs in Atomicparsley 20210124.204813.840499f through APar_readX() in src/util.cpp while parsing a crafted mp4 file because of the missing boundary check.

criterions.comment: atomicparsley package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
